results.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of March 21, 2017, as "National Rosie the Riveter Day".
results.short_title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of March 21, 2017, as "National Rosie the Riveter Day".
results.latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Supports the designation of March 21, 2017, as National Rosie the Riveter Day. Acknowledges the important role played by women during World War II.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Supports the designation of March 21, 2017, as National Rosie the Riveter Day. Acknowledges the important role played by women during World War II.

actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S1849)
Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. (text of measure as introduced: CR S1542)
